name: 1972 Schwinn Speedster
description:
1972 Schwinn Speedster
36 Volt, 600 Watt electric motor
Lighted thumb throttle with 20 amp speed controller
Removable battery bag for easy charging and loading
36 Volt - 1.0 Amp charger
Fully charged in roughly 6 hours
Top speed of around 25 mph
Top range of around 20 miles with mild pedal assist and conservative operation
Great for cruising with plenty of comfort, power, and style

name: 1963 Hawthorne
description:
1963 Hawthorne
48 Volt, 600 Watt electric motor
Lighted thumb throttle with 20 amp speed controller
Fixed saddle bag battery bank
48 Volt - 1.5 Amp charger
Fully charged in roughly 4 hours
Top speed of around 33 mph
Top range of around  13 miles with mild pedal assist and conservative operation
This is a fast bike, with lots of acceleration
